Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemBuilder< T >

Build a marker retargeting problem.

This class is in charge of building the optimization problem: the cost function, the constraints (function, intervals, scale) and will set the starting point of the optimization process.

It will also load the data that which will be used by the constraints function.

This class is parametrized by T, the problem type. By changing the problem type, sparse problems can also be solved.

Template Parameters:
Tproblem type
